title: Amy's Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a vegetarian section that includes 35 vegan/vegetarian mockmeat dishes, 6 soups, 9 other dishes, and 10 bean curd dishes. Some appetizers are also vegan. Bubble teas are available without milk. The menu is extensive and has meat, but the staff is aware of veg and works to accommodate.
